data.text: Manchester Utd took three shots on target, while West Ham managed one.

Cristiano Ronaldo created some of the best chances of the game - tallying an xA of 0.1 (the second highest of anyone on the pitch), while Bruno Fernandes created chances worth 0.4 xA (more than any other player on the pitch).
Harry Maguire successfuly completed 64 passes - more than any other player on the pitch.
Harry Maguire played more successful long balls than any other player on the pitch (16), followed by Bruno Fernandes, who completed eight.
Cristiano Ronaldo successfuly recieved 12 progressive passes (more than any other player on the pitch), while Harry Maguire won five aerial duels.
Harry Maguire carried the ball a total of 343 yards towards the opponent's goal - farther than any other player on the pitch.
Harry Maguire made more clearances than any other player on the pitch (four), followed by Cristiano Ronaldo, who made three.
Harry Maguire won the second most aerial duels of any player on the pitch.
Southampton completed 45% of the passes they played long, compared with 42% from Wolves.
Southampton allowed their opponent an average of 7.1 touches each time they pressed, while Manchester City allowed Spurs 2.1 touches per press.
In their last game, Southampton allowed Wolves 2.3 touches per press, while throughout the season they've pressed once for every 3.5 opponent touches.

Southampton attempted 15 challenges in the defensive third, considerably more than the three made by Manchester City. In their last game (against Wolves) the Saints attempted two challenges in the defensive third, while throughout the season they've averaged 8.1 per 90 minutes.
James Ward-Prowse played two key passes - more than any other Southampton player. James Ward-Prowse played two key passes.
Mohammed Salisu successfuly completed 28 passes (more than any other Southampton player), completing four successful tackles. Salisu attempted six challenges, completing four successful tackles.
James Ward-Prowse found a teammate with 80% of his attempted passes, the highest pass completion rate of any Southampton player.
Mohammed Salisu made more successful passes into the final third than any other Southampton player (three), followed by Stuart Armstrong, who completed two passes into the final third.
Mohammed Salisu made 239 yards worth of progressive passes, more than anyone else in a Southampton shirt, while James Ward-Prowse successfully passed the ball 192 yards towards the opponent's goal.
Mohammed Salisu played six successful long balls - more than any other Southampton player.
James Ward-Prowse pressed the opponent 29 times (more than any other player on the pitch), winning possession on seven occassions.
Mohammed Salisu made three interceptions, while Stuart Armstrong made five.
Mohammed Salisu made 15 clearances - more than any other player on the pitch.

data.text: Wolves spent large parts of the game without the ball, completing only 391 passes. In their last game (against Southampton) Wolves completed 248 passes.
Wolves succesffuly played 30 passes into the final third, considerably less than the 28 from Brentford. In their last game (against Southampton) Wolves completed 17 passes into the final third.
